pageElementContent:
About us




MARETEC is IST's multidisciplinary research centre (www.maretec.org e www.mohid.com) whose main activities are numerical modelling covering almost all phases of the water cycle from watershed to river, estuary and ocean.

Since 2009, Maretec has invested in operational modelling and nowadays provides daily modelling results for circulation, ecology and waves for the Portuguese Coastal waters and watersheds at different scales. If you want more information about Maretec activities and reaseach please click on the link below.

Visit MARETEC webpage
